channel.title: How do you logg in using hamachi
channel.description: I downloaded hamachi today but now i dontknow how to logg in on it, help

item.title: How do you logg in using hamachi
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

ok there are tutorials for these kinda things but ok…

Click the little triangle button and choose to create new network. after you’ve turned the power on. Then create a network name, and a password if you don’t want random people joining. as far as logging in, it’s mainly automatic, you choose a basic nickname once you turn the power on, and you have the option of clicking the small gear icon to set a master password. It’s not a registration process for the most part.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you logg in using hamachi
